trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Gir en basisklasse for komponenter som gir støtte for utforming i designer vert for Web-server kontrollerer som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En designer vert når brukeren bytter fra kilden til utformingsvisning, markup kildekode som beskriver en kontroll avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>abstrakt klasse som er analysert og en utformingen versjon av kontrollen er opprettet på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren bytter tilbake til visning i datakilden, er utformingen kontrollen beholdt i markup kildekode og redigeres i markup for websiden.

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: Den abstrakte klassen BaseDataListDesigner fungerer som en basisklasse for komponenter som gir støtte for utforming for kolonner som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>i designer vert.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class properties provide the following functionality: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: BaseDataListDesigner klasseegenskapene inneholder følgende funksjonalitet: den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>returnerer en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet, som vanligvis inneholder et objekt som er avledet av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>klasse for hvert nivå i treet arving av designer.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, Og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A>Egenskaper gir tilgang til de tilsvarende egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>Egenskapen gir tilgang til utformeren av datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>egenskapen henter standardvisningen av datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseDataListDesigner class methods provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Metodene BaseDataListDesigner klassen inneholder følgende funksjonalitet: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>metoden Klargjør utformeren for å vise, redigere og utforme den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>metoden aktiverer en komponent redigeringsprogrammet for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>metoden brukes til å legge til, fjerne eller skyggelegge utformingen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>Metoden genererer et objekt som kan brukes som datakilde under utformingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>metoden henter datakilden fra beholderen for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>metoden henter datakilden fra beholderen kontrollen løst til en angitte datamedlemmet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>metoden henter datakilden mal-beholder.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>-Metoden når det er en endring i den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>metoden kalles når tilknyttede kontrollen datakilden er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>metoden kalles når skjemaet for tilknyttede kontrollen datakilden endres.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>metoden kalles når et automatisk formatering skjema er brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>Og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A>metoder kan overstyres for å implementere funksjonaliteten som skal skje når en stil for tilknyttede kontrollen er endret eller når designer redigering av maler verbene er endret, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>metoden behandler egenskapen builder-hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework internt bygger en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>klasse når du oppretter den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klasse eller en kopi av kontrollen på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Henter designer handlingen liste-samlingen for utformeren.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the ActionLists base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ActionLists oppretter et tomt <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objekt og legger det <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>som returneres av egenskapen ActionLists base til dette <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Deretter legger den til den til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objekt, og returnerer dette <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objektet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> tilknyttet utformeren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for nøkkelen datafeltet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataKeyField property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataKeyField gir tilgang fra designer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>angir primærnøkkel for datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>verdien for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien i feltet data medlem av den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataMember gir tilgang fra designer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>angir tabellen eller element i datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>verdien for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for egenskapen datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataSource gir tilgang fra designer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>verdien for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter utformeren av datakilden, når en er valgt for databinding.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DataSourceDesigner returnerer designeren for datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer objektet implementerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Designer for datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den designer-versjonen av egenskapen datakilde-ID og brukes til å skyggelegge den tilsvarende egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's DataSourceID property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: Angivelse av designer DataSourceID egenskapen årsaker i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen angis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis DataSourceID er satt til en <xref:System.String>, som angir en ny datakilde er som skal defineres en **Opprett datakilde** dialogboks.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the DataSourceID is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Hvis DataSourceID er satt til en <xref:System.String>som angir det finnes ingen datakilde i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>er satt til en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som er i datakilde-ID for den tilknyttede kontrollen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Henter standardvisningen for datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerView property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DesignerView henter standardvisningen for datakilden som er bundet til den tilknyttede kontrollen ved å sende den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>egenskapen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen visning returneres eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>egenskapen er ikke angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A>metoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>brukes til å hente visningen navn og første visningsnavnet brukes til å hente standardvisningen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> som representerer standardvisningen av datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av designer og frigir eventuelt administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the Dispose method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den tilknyttede kontrollere som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen har en <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>egenskapen som implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>grensesnittet opp fjerningsmetoden kobler fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete>hendelse av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the Dispose disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>metoden avhending kobler fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>hendelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Avhending også kobler fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed>hendelser i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged>

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the Dispose base method.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt kaller base fjerningsmetoden.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Genererer et objekt som kan brukes som datakilde under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeDataSource prøver å lage en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet fra datakilden som er definert av den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette ikke er mulig, opprettes det en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>fra midlertidige data.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall rader i eksempeldataene som datakilden må inneholde.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis returnerte datakilden inneholder midlertidige data. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis returnerte datakilden inneholder data fra en faktisk datakilde.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnitt som fungerer som en datakilde for bruk under utformingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Genererer et objekt som kan brukes som datakilde under utformingen.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeDataSource method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetDesignTimeDataSource prøver å lage en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objektet fra datakilden som er angitt av den `selectedDataSource` parameteren.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dette ikke er mulig, opprettes det en <xref:System.Data.DataTable>fra midlertidige data.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som brukes som en mal for datatypen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: Minste antall rader eksempeldata som skal inneholde dataene kildedataene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis returnerte datakilden inneholder midlertidige data. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis returnerte datakilden inneholder data fra en faktisk datakilde.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnitt som fungerer som en datakilde for bruk under utformingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakilde-komponenten fra den tilknyttede kontroll beholderen, løses til en bestemt datamedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>Metoden bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>metode for å opprette en datakilde fra objektet som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> of the associated control, resolved to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember*> parameter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnitt som inneholder siden utformingen <> </> *> kontrollens tilknyttede, løses til den <> </> *> parameteren; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ikke finner en datakilde.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakilde-komponenten fra tilknyttede kontrollen beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The GetSelectedDataSource method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetSelectedDataSource bruker <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en datakilde fra objektet som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>egenskapen for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing the design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property of the associated control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnitt som inneholder siden utformingen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>for den tilknyttede kontrollen; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Hvis ikke finner en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: Henter datakilden malens beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataSource method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetTemplateContainerDataSource kaller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>metode for å opprette en datakilde fra objektet som er angitt av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som angir navnet på malen som skal få datakilden.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface containing a design-time <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> property.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som implementerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>grensesnitt som inneholder en utformingen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource*> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder utformeren for å vise, redigere og utforme den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Spørringsutformer verten kaller i initialiseringsmetoden når den er klar til å bruke designer til å gjengi kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: I initialiseringsmetoden base metodene konfigurere egenskaper og koble til hendelser som er nødvendige for operasjonen av designer.

trans-unit.source: The Initialize connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseringen kobler til datakilden utformingen og oppdateres utformingen markup.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the Initialize connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>egenskapen implementerer den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>grensesnittet initialiseringen kobler den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, og <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved>hendelser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: Den `component` parameteren er kontrollen som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, som er knyttet til utformeren eller en kopi av denne kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>, which implements an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En kontroll som er avledet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref>, som implementerer en <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer en komponent redigeringsprogrammet for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The InvokePropertyBuilder method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InvokePropertyBuilder oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>objekt, og starter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>metode for redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for siden med initialisere redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Behandler den <xref uid="langword_csharp_AutoFormat" name="AutoFormat" href=""> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormat method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnAutoFormat er foreldet og har ingen funksjonalitet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når et automatisk formatering skjema er brukt på den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The OnAutoFormatApplied method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnAutoFormatApplied kalles når et <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objekt som skal brukes på den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>objektet definerer en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>objekt som brukes til kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the OnAutoFormatApplied to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: En designer kan overstyre OnAutoFormatApplied skal undersøkes egenskaper for kontrollen eller gjøre noen endringer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"></xref> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat"> </xref> -objekt som definerer en stil.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når det er en endring i den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnComponentChanged kalles når den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>hendelse til en kontroll som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen utfører.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis som svar på en endring av kontrollen (for eksempel en **Egenskaper** rutenett endre).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>kontrollen er bundet til objektet er endret, kontrollen tegnes på utformingsoverflaten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>som kilden for hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceChanged base kobler den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen til den gjeldende datakilden, og hvis som er forskjellig fra datakilden som er koblet til kontrollen, metoden oppdaterer utformingen markup.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Representerer metoden som behandler egenskapen builder-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnPropertyBuilder method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPropertyBuilder aktiverer en komponent redigeringsprogrammet for den tilknyttede kontrollen som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Det opprettes en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor>objekt, og deretter aktiverer den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>metode for redigeringsprogrammet for komponenten.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som kilden for hendelsen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når skjemaet for datakilden for den tilknyttede kontrollen endres.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the OnSchemaRefreshed method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre designer er i modus for redigering av maler, eller et felt som legges til eller redigere metodekall OnSchemaRefreshed den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>metoden som kaller den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>metode for å oppdatere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>kontrollen for å gjenspeile endringen i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Kan overstyres for å implementere funksjonaliteten som skal skje når en stil for den tilknyttede kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The OnStylesChanged method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnStylesChanged kan tjene som varsling at en stil for den tilknyttede kontrollere som er avledet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>er endret.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: Kan overstyres for å implementere funksjonaliteten som skal utføres når designer redigering av maler verbene er endret.

trans-unit.source: The OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel registrere som en endring har forekommet, under redigering av maler verbene endre metoden OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged kan brukes til å utføre ytterligere behandling.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Brukes av designer Fjern egenskaper fra eller legge til flere egenskaper i visningen i den **Egenskaper** rutenett eller skyggen egenskapene for den tilknyttede kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen utviklere bruker metodene som er avledet fra den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden skyggelegge ulike egenskaper for kontroll med tilsvarende utformingen egenskaper som designer implementerer, og du kan legge til egenskaper til eller Fjern egenskaper fra den **Egenskaper** rutenett.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the PreFilterProperties creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For kolonner som er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>klassen PreFilterProperties oppretter utformingen egenskapene til skyggen den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: En samling implementering av en <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>grensesnittet for egenskapene tillagt og skyggelagt.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema*>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis skjemaet kan oppdateres; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du vil deaktivere databinding hendelser før etter skjemaet har oppdatert; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> å aktivere hendelsene.
